doc.title: In the Sweet Bye and Bye
doc.plot: Best friends Ethan and Jayson are preparing for the biggest meeting of their careers, if everything goes well they will have the break they have been waiting for. The night before, Ethan has a horrific dream he tries to block or so he thought. The meeting is beyond anything they imagined, offered more money than they asked for; their careers are about to take off, things could not be better. Ethan, meets a girl who is a spitting image of the girl he has dreamed of and been waiting for, for years. Then a random shooting and a mysterious stranger threaten to take it all away, but the final decision is up to him.
